Hi,

  I have written a build.xml for JUnit. Comparing to the one from the
CVS, it provide additional targets for the following task:

1. dist.bin and dist.src. These create binary and source distribution

2. dist will do both distributions

3. test.text, test.awt, test.swing: run JUnit test with three runner

4. test runs all three runners.

I'd hope JUnit team can adapt this build.xml. The current packaging of
JUnit makes it harder for teams like us who track JUnit modification. 

David Li
DigitalSesame
--------------BF1CC563B2356C75D4DFB727

 filename="build.xml.gz"
